Class Player

java.lang.Object
ijae.xgalead00.entity.Entity
ijae.xgalead00.entity.Player
public class Player extends Entity
Represents the player entity (Pacman) on the board. Handles score, key collection, and alive state. Movement direction is controlled externally.

  • Field Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description

    alive

    Whether the player has collected the key

    private int
    score
    Player's current score

  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player(int initx, int inity, javafx.scene.image.Image[] BaseImages)
      Constructs a Player at the given coordinates with base images.
      Parameters:
      initx - initial x-coordinate
      inity - initial y-coordinate
      BaseImages - base images (not used, defaults to Assets.PACMAN_FRAMES)

  • Method Details

    • setOnKeyCollected

      public void setOnKeyCollected(Runnable callback)
      Sets a callback to run when the player collects a key.
      Parameters:
      callback - function to call on key collection

    • TileEvents

      public void TileEvents(Tiles[][] tiles)
      Handles events on the tile the player is currently on. Updates score, key collection, and tile state.
      Parameters:
      tiles - 2D array of board tiles

      Marks the player as dead
